Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: What a confused mess. We need to be a LOT more careful in how we use JIRA, here. One JIRA per CR please. Do not use the epic JIRA tag on CRs. It is impossible to tell the progress on this epic.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: I THINK that only https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/c/20455/ needs to be merged, but it has parents that have not been merged and is not clearly related. ~levitate can you please help untangle?
